flawed_nl_solution:
Some of the pool floats were damaged, which means that 120 / 4 = <<120/4=30.0>>30.0 pool floats were discarded.
This left the class with 120 - 30.0 = <<120-30.0=90.0>>90.0 pool floats that were actually part of the donations they need to organize.
This means there were a total of 60 basketball hoops + 90.0 pool floats + 50 footballs + 40 tennis balls = <<60+90.0+50+40=204.0>>204.0 donations that were not basketballs.
So out of the donations, there were 300 donations - 204.0 = <<300-204.0=96.0>>96.0 basketballs.
In addition, half of the basketball hoops were donated with a basketball included which amounts to 60 basketball hoops / 2 = <<60/2=30.0>>30.0 basketballs.
There was therefore a total of 96.0 + 30.0 = <<96.0+30.0=126.0>>126.0 basketballs donated.
